name: radio_buttons
objective: Selecting a category triggers a search and displays results
description: When clicking on a category, the filtered applications must be displayed in the results area.
pre_condition: switch to application mode (click on "Applications" in the top bar)

steps.description: click on a category on the left (for example "Games")
steps.expected: the result area must be populated with appropriate applications (ex: Chess, Mines, Sudoku ...)

name: category_mostused
objective: Check that "Most used" category is working (postponed)
description:
The special category "Most used" must be visible in the category list. 

Selecting this category must list the appropriate applications in the results area.

Note: feature is postponed (jira:TZPC-766 TZPC-767)
pre_condition:
- switch to application mode (click on "Applications" in the top bar)
- open some applications (ex: Gnome Terminal, Calculator)

steps.expected: the recently used applications must be displayed in the result area (ex: Gnome Terminal, Calculator)
